patthana1.18:8.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:8.2: uppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:8.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:10.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:10.2: uppannaṃ cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā … pe …
patthana1.18:10.17: uppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.18:10.20: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.18:10.24: uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:11.1: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:11.7: anuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.18:11.10: Anuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:12.1: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:12.10: uppādī khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.18:12.13: Uppādī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:14.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:14.4: uppannaṃ cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.18:14.15: uppanne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati … pe ….
patthana1.18:14.18: uppannā adhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:15.1: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:15.8: anuppanne khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana1.18:16.1: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:16.10: uppādī khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati. #1
patthana1.18:18.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:18.2: uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:18.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā dvinnaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:18.10: Ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.18:18.14: mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:20.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:20.2: uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.18:20.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ vatthussa ca aññamaññapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:20.16: asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.18:22.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:22.2: uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.18:22.19: mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kaṭattārūpānaṃ upādārūpānaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.18:24.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:24.5: uppannaṃ utuṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādeti, vipassanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.18:24.11: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.18:24.14: senāsanaṃ upanissāya jhānaṃ uppādeti vipassanaṃ … pe …
patthana1.18:24.20: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.18:24.25: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:25.1: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:25.5: anuppannaṃ vaṇṇasampadaṃ patthayamāno dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.18:25.10: anuppanne khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.18:25.15: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:26.1: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:26.5: uppādiṃ cakkhusampadaṃ patthayamāno dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.18:26.14: uppādī khandhe patthayamāno dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti.
patthana1.18:26.23: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:28.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:28.6: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana1.18:28.8: domanassaṃ uppajjati dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.18:30.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:30.2: pacchājātā uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:32.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:32.2: uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:32.3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:34.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:34.2: vipāko uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ vipākapaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.18:34.6: paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.18:36.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:36.2: uppannā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:38.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:38.2: uppannā indriyā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:40.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:40.7: uppannā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:40.8: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:40.9: Khandhā vatthussa, vatthu khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:40.16: uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:42.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.18:42.4: uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.18:42.22: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.18:42.31: uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:44.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.18:47.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.18:50.1: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:51.1: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:52.1: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.18:56.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi … pe … navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate dve.
patthana1.18:59.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … nonatthiyā novigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.18:62.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṃ, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye ekaṃ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṃ, pacchājāte ekaṃ, kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṃ.
